text: Farm equipment is selling to the highest bidders at purplewave.com Place your bids on tractors and tillage implements, swathers and balers, combines and headers, sprayers and spreaders, livestock equipment, heavy trucks and trailers, planters and drills, pickups and more. Bidding is open now and we'll sell each item without a reserve or minimum bid on Wednesday, December 27th beginning at noon. Don't wait! Visit purplewave.com to get started. Purplewave Auction. Straight, simple, sold.
